content.title: First Question:
content.text: Which of the following is NOT one of RoboCops Prime Directives

options.label: No interference with a pre-warp civilization

content.title: Second Question:
content.text: Professional wrestler Andrade 'Cien' Almas was previously known as La Sombra, the leader of what villianous faction?

content.title: Third Question:
content.text: This MC has claimed to be a part of the Wu-Tang Clan, although the RZA has labeled him more 'like a first cousin'
